departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about how causes of death are being recorded, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Doctors who complete death certificates are required to record the causes of death to the best of their knowledge and belief. Whether or not Covid-19 or complications from a Covid-19 vaccination are listed as a cause of death is a clinical judgement for individual medical professionals.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Require vaccine history be recorded on death certificates: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/587506
